If you wanna play impossible games with randomly assigned teammaes that do absolute f*ck all, play against someone who's going to tunnel and camp you so that you can't even enjoy the game and last but not least spend half your time yelling "bullsh*t" at your monitor, you've come to the right place.
It's been 5 years and the game is still facing some of the issues it's started with. New cosmetics tho. Resident evil? You've got that right. Come play and pay our bills.

One of the ups this game has is that It is fun and an exciting game and also it has its downs like the way certain killers play. One thing I would recommend you doing is to watch a youtube video in order to get familiar with the mechanics of the game as the main goal of the game is evading the killer whilst doing generators. And if you are the killer is to kill the survivors and preventing them from doing generators. Each and every killer has their own power. And yeah that is basically it have fun evading the killer and killing survivors and have a great day.

No. If you're new just no. If you're old then just reaaaaally think about this game........ then realize no. Reasons omitted, because this game is so heavily unbalanced it just hurts thinking about it, and the community is so divided it's obvious that while under certain circumstances it may be fun, but under regular circumstances it's a practice of insanity. Buy it on sale as a party game that you play with friends and ONLY friends unless you love getting shit on, then by all means play killer. Find a killer to love and then get to higher ranks and realize what I told you before. Just no. Just no.
An amazing game, definitely not one for soloQing though as the game is much better with friends, most cosmetics can also be bought with earn-able currency.  9/10
